Package com.encoway.edu

Class EventDrivenUpdatesMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<String,String>
      • com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Map<String,String>

    @Default
@ViewScoped
public class EventDrivenUpdatesMap
extends AbstractMap<String,String>
implements Serializable

    A Map mapping event names to UIComponent IDs.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public String get(Object events)
           throws IllegalArgumentException

        Returns a space separated list of component IDs of components associated with events. If events is a String the following format is expected: event-a[[,] event-b][|default-value] Where default-value is returned if no matching event is found and defaults to @none.

        Specified by:
        get in interface Map<String,String>
        Overrides:
        get in class AbstractMap<String,String>
        Parameters:
        events - either String (see above) or an Iterable of Strings
        Returns:
        the list of component IDs associated with events or a default value (see above)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if events is not of the possible types
        See Also:
        get(String, String), get(Iterable, String)

      • get

        public String get(Iterable<String> events,
                  String defaultValue)

        Returns a space separated list of component IDs of components registered for at least one the events.

        Parameters:
        events - a collection of events
        defaultValue - will be returned if no component is registered for one of the events
        Returns:
        a space separated list of fully qualified component IDs or defaultValue

      • get

        public String get(String events,
                  String defaultValue)

        Returns a space separated list of component IDs of components registered for at least one the events.

        Parameters:
        events - a comma/space separated list of event names
        defaultValue - will be returned if no component is registered for one of the events
        Returns:
        a space separated list of fully qualified component IDs or defaultValue

      • add

        public void add(String events,
                String... ids)

        Maps the the specified ids as listeners for events.

        Parameters:
        events - the events triggering an update of the specified ids
        ids - the ids to be updated
